body:
use msdb

SELECT 
    [sJOB].[job_id] AS [JobID]
    , [sJOB].[name] AS [JobName]
    ,step.step_name
    ,step.command,step.*
FROM
    [msdb].[dbo].[sysjobs] AS [sJOB]
    LEFT JOIN [msdb].dbo.sysjobsteps step ON sJOB.job_id = step.job_id

--WHERE step.command Like '%org%'
--step.command LIKE '%MYTABLENAME%'
ORDER BY [JobName]
